patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance A
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Slide to C to form a right rear foot stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a middle vertical punch to D with the right fist while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Slide to C to form a left rear foot stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a middle vertical punch to D with the left fist while forming a right walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Execute a high side block to BC with the right knife-hand while forming a left walking stance toward BC.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a middle punch to BD with the left fist while forming a sitting stance toward BD. Perform 5 and 6 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Execute a high side block to BD with the left knife-hand while forming a right walking stance toward BD.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Execute a middle punch to BD with the right fist while forming a sitting stance toward BD. Perform 7 and 8 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Move the right foot to C turning clockwise to form a parallel stance toward A while executing a horizontal strike with a twin knife-hand.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Execute a high side piercing kick to C with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 9.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Execute a high turning kick to D with the right foot. Perform 10 and 11 in a continuous kick.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Lower the right foot to D in a jumping motion to form a right X-stance toward BD while executing a high side strike to D with the right back fist and bringing the left finger belly to the right side fist.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Move the left foot to C forming a parallel stance toward B while executing a horizontal strike with a twin knife-hand.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Execute a high side piercing kick to C with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 13.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Execute a high turning kick to D with the left foot. Perform 14 and 15 in a continuous kick.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Lower the left foot to D in a jumping motion to form a left X-stance toward AD while executing a high side strike to D with the left back fist and bringing the right finger belly to the left side fist.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Move the left foot to A forming a right L-stance toward A executing a low punch to A with a left double fist.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Bring the right palm on the left fore fist and then twist them counter clockwise until the left back fist faces downward while forming a left walking stance toward A, slipping the left foot. Perform in a releasing motion.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Execute a high punch to A with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward A.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Move the left foot on line AB to form a left L-stance toward B while executing a low punch to B with a right double fist.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Bring the left palm on the right fore fist and then twist them clockwise until the right back fist faces downward while forming a right walking stance toward B, slipping the right foot. Perform in a releasing motion.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a high punch to B with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward B.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Slide to B to form a right L-stance toward B while executing an upset punch to B with the right middle knuckle fist and bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Execute a front strike to B with the right back fist while forming a left walking stance toward B, slipping the right foot.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Slide to A, turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward A while executing an upset punch to A with the left middle knuckle fist and bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute a front strike to A with the left back fist while forming a right walking stance toward A, slipping the left foot.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Move the left foot to D forming a right walking ready stance toward C.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Jump to execute a flying front snap kick to C with the right foot.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Land to C forming a left L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Move the right foot to D to form a left walking stance toward C while executing a high front block with the right forearm.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while shifting to C, maintaining a left walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Turn clockwise, pivoting with the left foot to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a high front block with the left forearm.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while shifting to D, maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Execute a middle block to BC with a double arc-hand while forming a left walking stance toward BC and looking through the hands.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a high inward strike to BC with the right knife-hand and bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder while maintaining a left walking stance toward BC.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Execute a circular block to BD with the left inner forearm while forming a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Execute a low front snap kick to D with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 37.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Lower the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing amiddle punch to D with the left fist.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 39 and 40 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Execute a rising block with an X-knife-hand while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Execute a middle block to AC with a double arc-hand while forming a right walking stance toward AC and looking through the hands.
patternSteps.44: Step 43. Execute a high inward strike to AC with the left knife-hand and bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder while maintaining a right walking stance toward AC.
patternSteps.45: Step 44. Execute a circular block to AD with the right inner forearm while forming a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.46: Step 45. Execute a high punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.47: Step 46. Execute a low front snap kick to D with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 45.
patternSteps.48: Step 47. Lower the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.49: Step 48. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Perform 47 and 48 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.50: Step 49. Execute a rising block with an X-knife-hand while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.51: Step 50. Move the left foot to D, and then slide to D, turning counter-clockwise to form a right L-stance toward C while executing a low guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.52: Step 51. Jump to C, spinning counter-clockwise to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.53: Step 52. Execute a low block to D with the right knife-hand and a middle outward block to D with the left inner forearm while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot.
patternSteps.54: Step 53. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 52 and 53 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.55: Step 54. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while forming a right L-stance toward D, pulling the left foot.
patternSteps.56: Step 55. Move the right foot to D, and then slide to D, turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward C while executing a low guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.57: Step 56. Jump to C, spinning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.58: Step 57. Execute a low block to D with the left knife-hand and a middle outward block to D with the right inner forearm while forming a right walking stance toward D slipping the right foot.
patternSteps.59: Step 58. Execute a high punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Perform 57 and 58 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.60: Step 59. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while forming a left L-stance toward D, pulling the right foot.
patternSteps.61: Step 60. Move the right foot to the side rear of the left foot, and then slide to C, forming a left L-stance toward D at the same time executing a scooping block with the right palm.
patternSteps.62: Step 61. Shift to D, maintaining a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the left fist.
patternSteps.63: Step 62. Turn clockwise while forming a left bending ready stance A toward C.
patternSteps.64: Step 63. Execute a high side piercing kick to C with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 62.
patternSteps.65: Step 64. Lower the right foot to C, forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the left fist.
patternSteps.66: Step 65. Move the right foot to D, forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.67: Step 66. Move the left foot to the side rear of the right foot, and then slide to D, forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a scooping block with the left palm.
patternSteps.68: Step 67. Shift to C, maintaining a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the right fist.
patternSteps.69: Step 68. Turn counter-clockwise while forming a right bending ready stance A toward C.
patternSteps.70: Step 69. Execute a high side piercing kick to D with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 68.
patternSteps.71: Step 70. Lower the left foot to D to form a left walking stance toward D at the same time executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.72: Step 71. Move the left foot to C to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.73: Step 72. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while forming a right walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot. Perform 71 and 72 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.74: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
